patthana21.37:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.37:5.1: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.37:6.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.37:8.1: Nahetuṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.37:9.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
